main event: Several witnesses reported sighting a bright red unidentified object in the sky off the coast of Oregon on September 3, 1963.
interesting points: The object appeared bright red and slowed as it passed overhead,The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes, and the object had the appearance of a last magnitude star,Multiple sources, including an airline crew and a nearby naval vessel, independently reported similar sightings in the area,Weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility during the observation.
sighted object: a bright red object in the sky
witness description: Captain Dexter Harrington, airline pilot; Frank Halltrom, fisherman; naval vessel crew.
